title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions on text selection seem to be distributed arbitrarily. This should be changed. It is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. It is not acceptable to force users to switch the view in order to access certain actions.
OB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is not available on text selection in the editor.
EB: I expected the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' to be available when I select text in the editor.
SR:
1. Open the editor.
2. Select some text.
3. Right-click on the selected text to open the context menu.
4. Check if the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is present in the context menu.
